description: London is the capital of the United Kingdom and England. Located along River Thames, London has been a central city since it was founded.
Paris (nicknamed the 'City of Light') is the capital city of France, and the largest city in France.
Los Angeles (L.A.), officially the City of Los Angeles, is the biggest city in California with over 18 million people in the L.A. region.
Machu Picchu is a 15th-century Inca citadel located in southern Peru. It is located on a 7,970 ft mountain ridge above the Sacred Valley.
Tokyo is the de facto capital and most populous prefecture of Japan with an estimated population of 13,960,236.
